alert.note: Alert for Bedford; Blair; Fulton; Huntingdon; Southern Centre; Southern Clinton; Southern Lycoming (Pennsylvania) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Wind Chill Warning issued December 24 at 4:45AM EST until December 24 at 12:00PM EST by NWS State College
info.description: ...WIND CHILL WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL NOON EST TODAY... * WHAT...Dangerously cold wind chills. Wind chills as low as 25 below zero this morning, then 10 to 15 below zero this afternoon. * WHERE...Portions of central Pennsylvania. * WHEN...Until noon EST today. * IMPACTS...Areas of blowing snow could result in poor driving conditions, mainly over the Allegheny Plateau. Gusty winds could cause downed tree limbs and isolated power outages. The cold wind chills could cause frostbite on exposed skin in as little as 30 minutes.
info.instruction: Avoid going outside during the coldest parts of the day. Dress in layers and cover exposed skin. Wear a hat and gloves. Frostbite and hypothermia can occur within minutes if precautions are not taken. Review winter weather safety and preparedness information at weather.gov/winter. The latest forecast information can be found on the NWS State College Facebook page and Twitter @NWSStateCollege, or on the web at weather.gov/ctp.
